concept.title: Basic Installation with Custom Libraries
concept.shortdesc: You can download and install a basic version of , and then install individual stage libraries as needed.

conbody.p: installationbasic with custom librariesThe basic installation includes , development stages, most processors, and the origins and destinations in the basic stage library, such as Directory and Local FS. You can then use the command line interface to install additional stage libraries.
Use the basic installation to install only the stage libraries that you want to use. The basic installation also results in smaller downloads for installation files.

The basic installation includes the following origins:Check this list with each release
The basic installation includes all processors
The basic installation includes the following destinations:
